title.rendered: Marvel vs. Capcom: Clash of Super Heroes

content.rendered:
Marvel vs Capcom

Description

Marvel vs. Capcom: Clash of Super Heroes is a retro-style fighting game developed by Capcom in 1998 where you’ll find characters from Marvel comics and Capcom’s video games such as Wolverine, Mega Man, Captain America, Strider Hiryu and many more.

You need to build up a team of characters from Capcom or Marvel and engage in combat.

Every character has the unique special moves and combos.

Capcom Characters

  • Zangief
  • Ryu
  • Strider Hiryu
  • Morrigan Aensland
  • Jin Saotome
  • Mega Man
  • Chun-Li
  • Captain Commando

Marvel Characters

  • Hulk
  • Captain America
  • Spider-Man
  • Gambit
  • Venom
  • Wolverine
  • War Machine

Developer

Marvel vs. Capcom: Clash of Super Heroes is developed and published by Capcom in January 12, 1998.

Gameplay
